topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551704916368726404aa0100#post_551704916368726404aa0100
[bq="mariomarc"]
Thank you for good news

[/bq]
If you want more good news then if it weren't for the middle east war in the world would be almost unheard of.

I'm going to talk out my butt for a minute and make a assumption here, but that's probably why the warhawks in the usa congress wants the Iran nuclear deal to fail.  If the nuclear deal success then the war industry is just fucked cause if we are allied with Iran then all those groups Iran is allied with will have to appease Iran which in turn means no more causing shit.

Basically what I'm getting at is that people that are pro-war are freaking out about the Iran nuclear deal because if there the nuclear deal succeeds then we could easily see global peace in our life time.

Tl:dr; pro-war people don't want the nuclear deal to succeed cause that'll cause the last region in the world where wars are extremely common to become stable and stability in the middle east means next to no more new wars.


Tl:dr of Tl:dr; If I was president I would suck as much cock as needed to get the nuclear deal passed.
